# Criztec Technologies

Criztec Technologies is a professional software and web development agency specializing in Astro, Ruby on Rails, Django, and business automation.

## Core Services
- Modern Web Development (Astro, Next.js)
- Robust Backend Solutions (Rails, Django)
- AI Integration & Agentic Workflows
- Cloudflare Ecosystem Optimization

## Technical Stack
- Astro 5
- Tailwind CSS
- Cloudflare Workers / Workers
- n8n Automation

## Useful Links
- [Website](https://criztec.com)
- [Blog](https://criztec.com/blog)
- [Contact](https://criztec.com/contact)
